name: iCarly 2: iJoin the Click!
description:
For the first time ever, enter the world of iCarly! Explore locations from the show, play insane games, and unlock and collect crazy items!

Hang out with Carly, Sam, Freddie, Spencer, and Gibby as you work to make the most awesome iCarly show ever!

  • Explore the iCarly World - visit over 20 locations from the show!
  • Create and perform your own segments from the show!
  • Collect hundreds of items to decorate your room and the set!
  • Make the show even more popular and meet tons of new friends along the way!
